website_summaries.verdict: An affordable and extra-colorful curved monitor geared towards gaming.
pros: Its Quantum Dot technology and WQHD display pumps out vivid and true-to-life color, while amplifying deeper black and brighter white hues
An 1800R curved screen delivers a more immersive viewing experience
cons: 32” is just large enough to really appreciate the monitor’s curved effect

customer_reviews.title: Love it! The mount could be better
customer_reviews.text: Have had this monitor now for a few months. Love it! The mount could be better, and a VESA adapter would be wonderful. But the monitor itself is great. I'd give this a full 5 stars if I could mount this with a VESA mount.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Speicher

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy!
customer_reviews.text: I spend about 5 to 6 hours a day photo editing. I love this monitor. It doesn't turn or adjust very easy but not a big deal for me, as I don't really need to move it. I have noticed that my eyes do not strain as much as they did with my last LG monitor (which is now a secondary monitor). I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J.Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor, Sold Well Built, BUT the Stand is just Wobbly
customer_reviews.text: The monitor is great, sharp, crisp, clear, excellent detail. The set up was extremely easy to complete was up and running in 10 minutes. I use this for work as a dual monitor set up on each side of my desk. My Acer monitor with similar design with difference fork mount rock solid. The Samsung stands wobbles when I type and had to bolster the stand by placing something under the bevel to keep it from wobbling. Probably ok if your sitting back using it to play games with a wireless controller but if you are typing you might want to get one with a better stand.
customer_reviews.author: J. S Thomas

customer_reviews.title: So happy. So sad I am left waiting.
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with the he quick delivery. Package was partially open left on my door step. The monitor is very attractive. Takes up a deep foot print on the desk. I think I will be happy with the monitor display when I can turn it on. Apparently the power supply is dead on arrival. No lights when plugged into three separate recepticles. :-}. Samsung was happy to send a new power supply. That is making me wait... I may update this review when I can actually take an on the monitor on. Anyone know of a Versa mount for this monitor?
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Sowder

customer_reviews.title: Terrible blacks
customer_reviews.text: Honestly not as good as I thought terrible blacks for a quantom dot screen my current samsung moniter has 5,000 to 1 contrast and this is only 3000 to 1 trust me it's not worth the $$ returning it tomorrow
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Estrada

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Monitor!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this monitor for my computer and Xbox One X. I have been using this for 2 weeks now and I absolutely love it. The menu button is so easy to navigate and the picture quality of the Qled technology is amazing. I dont usually write reviews, but this monitors quality prompted me to write one. For gamers, this monitor is breathtaking. 5/5!
customer_reviews.author: Rafi Rahman

customer_reviews.title: Power cable plug overheating?!
customer_reviews.text: Bought mine in June 2018, I recently started to notice that it would shut off by itself. Come to find out, the power cable plug gets super hot! Not sure if mine was defective, so now I can't use this monitor in long periods of time. Anyone else have this problem?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended.  Monitor flickers and no customer support
customer_reviews.text: Monitor worked fine for about a month, then it started flickering to the point where it was unusable. Spent hours on my own or on phone with support troubleshooting, replacing cables ,testing with different setups and finally sent it in for repair.......twice. Only to be told "No Problem Found", TWICE. Yet, after it was returned to me both times, it immediately resumed flickering. The monitor didn't last 6 months and I can't seem to get anyone to either fix or replace it. Based on the failure and lack of customer support, I cannot recommend this monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Ring

customer_reviews.title: Died after 8 months
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this monitor in January 2019 and it died in August 2019. It will not power up.
customer_reviews.author: Mark I. Frazer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible qc
customer_reviews.text: Had a line running right through the screen, and this was the 2nd one I had ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Pratt

customer_reviews.title: 2 years in and the screen is now pink with strange line in the middle
customer_reviews.text: Title says it all. 2 years in and the screen is now pink with a strange line in the middle, was never dropped, and barely moved from where I was first placed (office desk). One day all a sudden the screen dimmed and there was a strange line on it. Not worth all that money.
customer_reviews.author: aaaaa

customer_reviews.title: Monitor constantly fickered
customer_reviews.text: Was sold as refurbished and said to expect dents and scratches. Instead it was in great shape except that the screen constantly flickers. Even with no input and just the On Screen Menu it flickers. Tried it on same computer that had 27 inch version that works perfectly. Whomever tested this monitor obviously didn't spend more than a couple of seconds looking at it.
customer_reviews.author: WaitAndSee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the price
customer_reviews.text: was frustrating at first because the adjustments were not intuitive. After a week I had things dialed in and now I want another one as a second monitor.. waiting for a price drop.
customer_reviews.author: dofphoto

customer_reviews.title: Thinking 32 Inch or smaller? Get this one instead!
customer_reviews.text: The display on this screen is beautiful. The color on the digital screen display is awesome and I love the white outer shell. This is such an awesome buy, trust me and get one!
customer_reviews.author: LIATA

customer_reviews.title: I loved it! Picture is awesome
customer_reviews.text: I loved it! Picture is awesome, color is outstanding! only reason for the missing star is the limited inputs. 1 display port and one HDMI.
customer_reviews.author: cloudwalker

customer_reviews.title: Samsung curved Monitor
customer_reviews.text: We like these so much that we now have 5 of them here at work. The picture is crystal clear. I love the cord hook up. One cord built in the back of the monitor. so easy to hook up.
customer_reviews.author: DEBB JAECK

customer_reviews.title: This monitor looks great! The upgrade from a 27" IPS is tremendous
customer_reviews.text: This monitor looks great! The upgrade from a 27" IPS is tremendous! My only issue is that it's so big that I now get motion sick from FPS games on full screen.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R Huyett

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd one, have 1 in office and 1 at home office. Now I can see and read more easily.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence J. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Pixels died 15 months after purchase
customer_reviews.text: very good clear monitor, had great hopes considering I paid well over $400 for it brand new. worked great for 15 months, then one morning I turned it on and a blue line appeared and won't go away after several shut downs and restarts.
customer_reviews.author: B. D. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: I buy it’s for a project of 3 monitors and it’s visual are very beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Nice monitor the settings are easy great pictureand is a Qledi buy this for a
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent computer monitor display. Great picture and illumination adjustments. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: outstanding monitor
customer_reviews.text: great resolution, great for gaming feels like I am in the game
customer_reviews.author: daniel fassett

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These displays are awesome. I used them to replace my Dell infinity edge displays.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: DOA after 12 hours
customer_reviews.text: No power after 12 hours. Anyone know how to take the stand off the back of the monitor? I turned it to the right to get it on but it won't turn to the left to remove for return shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Love.. This monitor so much
customer_reviews.text: Coming from a 24" TN panel WOW. I... Love.. This monitor so much! No pixel problems. Perfect colors. Great view angles. In all honesty, I got this so I can see people far away in Pubg. It helps so much, Lol Every game just looks so much better in 2k vrs 1080p! - Only con is that I do see some occasional tear in games, even with Freesync enabled properly. I have a ASUS 380. Updated drivers and Radeon says Freesync is enabled. Meh.
customer_reviews.author: Vman

customer_reviews.title: Great Display for Gaming
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived in great condition. This display is very vibrant and is working perfectly as a gaming monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product with great color and text. Arrived very fast and is perfect. As usual, Amazon at its best!
customer_reviews.author: scot stern

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 6 days...  and only several hours of use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this monitor and received it last weekend. It worked well out of the box although my computer would not allow me to set a resolution beyond 1920 x 1200. That was last weekend... today, when I went to wake up my computer and the monitor, there was no display. I could see that the monitor was powered on and it was being recognized by my GPU. After an hour with Samsung customer service, I was asked to send it in for service. It's going straight back to Amazon. I've been a loyal Samsung customer for over ten years, but have watched their quality go to..... pieces. I will never again buy another Samsung product
customer_reviews.author: Nunyadambidness

customer_reviews.title: It has no audio ports
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be bright even when its turned all the way down picture looks great but sucks that it has no audio ports for sound
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Meh, but it is quantum dot.
customer_reviews.text: The bottom of the monitor takes a lot space on your desk, you really need a big table to put this thing on. The screen is good, but it is 1440p. So for the price of premium monitor, it is striking low on the its value.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: too much Color and not realistic ..please samsung bring samething deserve all the high price.
customer_reviews.author: mahmood

customer_reviews.title: I do like this monitor
customer_reviews.text: I do like this monitor. The stand was easy to set up and was compatible with my other monitor I have at work. The color is vibrant and I love the size of the screen. No complaints with any of that. I do have to say that I was disappointed it was dinged in one corner, and that made there be a small line across the top of the screen as well as the corner not working (the size of a pinky nail. The packaging was very secure, so I think a bad product was sent that way on purpose? Not certain.
customer_reviews.author: ER

customer_reviews.title: I contacted Samsung directly and their customer service has been horrible. They first recommended that I power cycle the ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this monitor over the holidays and it immediately stopped working (would not connect to my laptop). I contacted Samsung directly and their customer service has been horrible. They first recommended that I power cycle the monitor every morning (unplug it), which I found unacceptable. Then when it stopped working for good they took weeks to get back to me. Finally, it looks like they are going to replace it, but I will have been without a monitor for over a month. It was a fine monitor when it worked, but I just personally wouldn't risk it. I use multiple Dell monitors at work (including the U3415W) and I would recommend those of this one.
customer_reviews.author: RBN

customer_reviews.title: 2 units, just over 1 year.
customer_reviews.text: The first one (C32H711) I bought did not function out of the box and was quickly replaced. The second worked for just over a year and one day just shut down. I have tried everything to get it to get it to turn back on and can't seem to get a response from Samsung about it. For the price I would expect a quality long lasting item not a disposable monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Ostermeier

customer_reviews.title: a very good monitor that is somewhat more expensive than other monitors
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice monitor. The curved screen makes viewing the monitor easier also. The monitor appears to be well built and we have had no trouble with it so far. However, I note that this monitor is more expensive than some similar monitors and I don't see anything here to justify the greater price, so while this monitor works just fine, I recommend that potential buyers shop around amazon to look at other curved 32 inch QHD monitors. In particular, this monitor is QHD and there are curved 32 inch monitors that are FHD, and, my research on the internet led me to believe that FHD is better than QHD.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Regan

customer_reviews.title: Bad QC
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on the display but my boyfriend had to return his because the display started overheating, eventually burning through the display! Bad QC process
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Samsung C32H711 32" WQHD (2560x1440) Curved QLED Monitor with FreeSync (LC32H711QENXZA)
product_meta.description: 1800R Curvature Samsung Monitor. Clean 360-back design monitor with Quantum Dot, and AMD FreeSync. 3-sided Bezel-less Display.
feature_bullets: Clean Back Design (Concealed Cables). Product Dimensions With Stand - 28.05 x 20.43 x 10.88 Inches. Product Dimensions Without Stand - 28.05 x 16.56 x 2.47 Inches
AMD FreeSync. Refresh Rate: 60Hz. Power supply type AC 100~240V
NOTE: Refer the User Manual and the User Guide from the Technical Specification before use which is highly recommended.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars74 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
